Cicero.Halsted Street station: Halsted Street, also known as Halsted Street/U.I.C., is a station on Metra's BNSF Railway Line, located in Chicago, Illinois. The station is 1.8 miles (2.9 km) away from Union Station, the eastern terminus of the West Line. Halsted Street station is elevated and consists of two island platforms on an embankment near an overpass.
